src:
Great deal on this desktop monitor riser
01 Nov 2019, 18:17 by Mark Frauenfelder



I bought this monitor riser in early 2017. It lifts my desk monitor 4.25 inches, and I use the space below to stow external disk drives. Amazon has it on sale right now for $9.98.
